data.text: @beranisland @tripperhead @Phillip_In_HK Guess what? That's exactly what one of their "experts" just said this morning. https://t.co/s1bI0LxLTR
@tripperhead Maybe I’ll take a closer look at the brands on offer here…. 😬 https://t.co/XcGWqFRXs7
@trancehime @DennisPhilipse @tripperhead So is it the case where we accept it if it's approved by HSC and/or CE?
@WhisperSpy88 @tripperhead Most of them are made in China and are recognised by EU / USA authorities...
@tripperhead @Phillip_In_HK @VisionOfAsia Except if they do CUT by RAT in testing center! ( it works with the 18M received )
@tripperhead Hi Aaron, I cannot get to Mr. Wongs FB page. Is there a way to connect to him please?
@trancehime @tripperhead @wongmjane Ah. OK. So pretty useless then. Thanks anyway.
@SwissInHKG @tripperhead @wongmjane I wasn't talking about the compulsory universal testing. I was talking about the CTNs that they stopped posting.

@Phillip_In_HK @VisionOfAsia I'm going to go all "conspiracy theorist" for a moment, and only in a reply, but I wonder if getting a confirmation of infection on the RAT website will help you avoid isolation post CUT.

Plenty of formerly infected persons are going to test CUT positive.
